author: China Insights
description:

The “accident script” behind the red carpet is being—

title: Zhao Wei’s Line Shocks the Web

author: China Insights
description:
The Yu Menglong incident continues to rage on, and the deeper people dig, the stranger it gets. Even three rescue attempts by Yang Mi ended in failure, and the “ominous list” has added another name—Gong Jun! A meticulous “four-step smear plan” has quietly rolled out—fake videos, AI face-swapping, betrayal by old friends, and PR whitewashing. Whistleblowers have vanished, surveillance has been deleted, evidence has disappeared, and the truth seems to be pushed into an even darker abyss. Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and enable the bell.

title: Yang Mi’s Rescue Failed—Who’s Next? Gong Jun？

author: China Insights
description:
The darker the digging goes, the more horrifying the hidden side of actor Yu Menglong’s case becomes. Now the rumors are spinning out of control: word has it there’s a “red USB” containing the entertainment industry’s secrets, a mysterious “Sacrifice Room” has been exposed, and the list of names allegedly involves Song Yiren, Du Qiang, and even descendants of Li Peng and Ye Ting. Was this really just an accident—or a “sacrificial execution” in a power game?Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and enable the bell.

title: Red USB Exposed? Yu Menglong Case Twist

author: China Insights
description:
In ancient times there was Dou E, whose grievance brought snow in June—heaven and earth moved with compassion. Today there is the “male Dou E,” the actor yu menglong, leaving the world with endless regret. Coincidentally, on the National Mourning Day, his hometown Altay in Xinjiang was hit by a sudden blizzard. The world turned white, car accidents multiplied, traffic collapsed—like a real-life version of “snow in June.”Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and enable the bell.
